perturbation.original_text: CERES will pay all such invoices within thirty (30) days after the invoice date. Payments shall be remitted to: Institute Secretary Institute of Grassland and Environmental Research Plas Gogerddan Aberystwyth Ceredigion SY23 3EB United Kingdom
perturbation.changed_text: CERES will pay all such invoices within sixty (60) days after the invoice date. Payments shall be remitted to: Institute Secretary Institute of Grassland and Environmental Research Plas Gogerddan Aberystwyth Ceredigion SY23 3EB United Kingdom
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline from thirty (30) days to sixty (60) days, creating uncertainty regarding the payment terms.

perturbation.original_text: The undersigned [Party/[CERES/IGER]] signatory certifies that the material and related information set forth hereinafter are included in the shipment with which this form is enclosed. The undersigned [Party/[CERES/IGER]] signatory acknowledges having received in good order the material and related information set forth hereinafter. [Include description of material and related information.] THIS MATERIAL AND RELATED INFORMATION ARE TRANSFERRED ONLY FOR USE IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE ABOVE MENTIONED FIELD TRIAL AGREEMENT. CONFIDENTIALITY OBLIGATIONS APPLY. For sending/receipt, For receipt/sending, Signature: Signature: Date: Date: Name: Name: Title: Title: [CERES/IGER] [Party]
perturbation.changed_text: The undersigned [Party/[CERES/IGER]] signatory certifies that the material and related information set forth hereinafter are included in the shipment with which this form is enclosed. The undersigned [Party/[CERES/IGER]] signatory acknowledges having received in good order the material and related information set forth hereinafter. [Include description of material and related information.] THIS MATERIAL AND RELATED INFORMATION ARE TRANSFERRED ONLY FOR USE IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE ABOVE MENTIONED FIELD TRIAL AGREEMENT. CONFIDENTIALITY OBLIGATIONS APPLY. For sending/receipt, For receipt/sending, Signature: Signature: Date: Date: Name: Walter E. Nelson Name: Title: Product Development Manager CERES, INC. Title: INSTITUTE OF GRASSLAND AND ENVIRONMENTAL RESEARCH [Party]
perturbation.explanation: The modification causes an in-text contradiction by prefilling the 'Name' and 'Title' fields with values for CERES, INC. and INSTITUTE OF GRASSLAND AND ENVIRONMENTAL RESEARCH. This conflicts with the purpose of the form, creating confusion as to who should be signing and what information should be provided.

perturbation.original_text: Royalties shall be payable by March 31 of each year with respect to the NET SALES and LICENSE INCOME received by CERES and any AFFILIATED COMPANIES in the preceding calendar year. Payments shall be made by check to the following address: Institute Secretary Institute of Grassland and Environmental Research Plas Gogerddan Aberystwyth Ceredigion SY23 3EB United Kingdom
perturbation.changed_text: Royalties shall be payable by June 30 of each year with respect to the NET SALES and LICENSE INCOME received by CERES and any AFFILIATED COMPANIES in the preceding calendar year. Payments shall be made by wire transfer to the following bank account: Institute Secretary Institute of Grassland and Environmental Research Plas Gogerddan Aberystwyth Ceredigion SY23 3EB United Kingdom
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the royalty payment deadline from March 31 to June 30 and altering the payment method from check to wire transfer, creating ambiguity regarding the payment terms.
